revision.text:
{| class="wikitable" !'''''[[Gluster_File_System_Documentation | Home!!]]''''' |} If you're interested in extending GlusterFS, learning about it's architecture or participating in the developer workflow, you'll want to read this: *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Planning35 GlusterFS 3.5 Release Planning] - Discuss planning the 3.5 release. *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Features Features in Development] - submit feedback on proposed features, or add your own. *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Backport_Wishlist Backport Wishlist] - bugs fixed in master you would like to see backported to a previous release branch *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Backport_Guidelines Backport Guidelines]- Guidelines for backporting patches/changes to a stable branch *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Projects Projects] - projects that can be worked on. *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Language_Bindings Language Bindings] - Connect to GlusterFS from programs written in languages other than C using these libgfapi bindings. *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Fixing_Issues_Reported_By_Tools_For_Static_Code_Analysis Fixing Issues Reported By Tools For Static Code Analysis] - This is good a starting point for developers to get involved with GlusterFS project. *[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/EasyFix_Bugs EasyFix Bugs] - EasyFix bugs for GlusterFS.

{| class="wikitable" !'''''[[Gluster_File_System_Documentation | Home!!]]''''' |}
